A group of friends discover a hidden underground city where the sun is being kept. They must find a way to rescue the sun and bring it back to the surface.
A scientist invents a machine that can create a replica of the sun, but when it's activated, it creates a massive solar flare that engulfs the world.
A group of astronauts on a mission to a distant planet discover that the sun is missing from their own planet and must find a way to bring it back before their own planet is destroyed.
A young boy has a dream where the sun is missing and he is the only one who can save it. He sets out on a journey to find the sun and discovers that it has been taken by a group of magical creatures.
A group of people are trapped in a building during a solar eclipse and must find a way to survive until the sun rises again.
